interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Suspicions Of Mr. Whicher: The Murder At Road Hill House
Review Date: 2018/06/23
Categories: Suspense, Drama, Emotional, Serious
Product Description: ['Inspector Jack Whicher is part of the newly formed Scotland Yard detective department and travels to Rode, Wiltshire, to investigate a murder at a country house. With no material evidence and only an inept local police force to help, he faces the unenviable task of solving a case in which members of the grieving family are the main suspects.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['James Hawes'], 'Producers': ['Nigel Marchant', 'Robert Bullock'], 'Starring': ['Paddy Considine', 'Peter Capaldi', 'Alexandra Roach']}
Review Text: I really enjoy these episodes. The costumes, sets, lighting, and plot twists are all well done.
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
